entry.title: Rinnai Propane Gas Rice Cooker 55 Cups RER-55ASL NSF
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rinnai
Type: Rice Cookers
Price: 449.99

Rinnai 50 cup Rice Cooker (RER55ASL) is great for restaurant use because it can cook up to 50 cups or 100 bowls of rice in 22 minutes, and keeps it warm for hours. The preparation of rice has traditionally been a cooking process which requires time-consuming attention to ensure the rice is cooked properly. This automatic rice cooker will simplify the process by automatically controlling the heat and timing, while freeing up a heating element on the range. Simply add the correct amount of rice and water to this cooker, turn it on, and walk away! This gas rice cooker has a piezo pilot ignition and runs on propane gas.
 
Prepare large or small quantities of rice to perfection, with Rinnai gas-fired rice cookers. These safe, dependable, commercial-quality cookers simmer rice to maturity in less time than electric cookers, while also saving energy and money. Cook from 25 to 55 cups of rice using either natural gas or propane. The automatic two-stage burner and automatic simmer function complement the accurate, dependable thermostat, so rice comes out perfect and fluffy every time.

entry.title: Rinnai 55 Cups Natural Gas Rice Cooker RER-55ASN

Type: Rice Cookers

Rinnai 50 cup Rice Cooker (RER55AS) is great for restaurant use because it can cook up to 50 cups or 100 bowls of rice in 22 minutes, and keeps it warm for hours. The preparation of rice has traditionally been a cooking process which requires time-consuming attention to ensure the rice is cooked properly. This automatic rice cooker will simplify the process by automatically controlling the heat and timing, while freeing up a heating element on the range. Simply add the correct amount of rice and water to this cooker, turn it on, and walk away! This gas rice cooker has a piezo pilot ignition and runs on natural gas.
 
Prepare large or small quantities of rice to perfection, with Rinnai gas-fired rice cookers. These safe, dependable, commercial-quality cookers simmer rice to maturity in less time than electric cookers, while also saving energy and money. The automatic two-stage burner and automatic simmer function complement the accurate, dependable thermostat, so rice comes out perfect and fluffy every time.
